channel.title: Rules being to strict here
channel.description: I beleive the rules here are way to strict. For instance this is RSPS Community yet when creating a forums you need a webhost. So why let people provide to others their hosting needs is it because you guy's are a bit to greedy with money and don't wanna see people make more then your forums ? I know this is going to get nothing but bad replies but whatever. As I see it I have seen over 200 members leave in the past month so it don't really bug me any just hurting yourself :D r-s FTW

item.title: Rules being to strict here
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m going to lock this now. He was muted for reasons you all probably already know.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules being to strict here
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Davidi2:

I’ve seen a lot of moderated people lately but it’s hard to say whether or not they were justified without being able to see the posts (potentially deleted) and infraction reasons. Doesn’t look like too many though, so idunno what the big deal is. Did OP only get infracted for this post or is he QQing about getting infracted for selling something

Trisidia was being an idiot and posted a thread about him selling VPS slots or something close. When everyone said “uhhh, read the rules and delete your post” Dawson got all butt hurt because Tris is his friend apparently, and decided to take it upon himself to make a scene about it and post this.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules being to strict here
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:13, topic:525819”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=644557.msg4337017#msg4337017 date=1374534599]

This is how it goes:

One mod feels like the forum is getting a little…rowdy, and goes on an infraction spree then realizes that the nature of the forum is to joke/troll have fun then sits back down.

Rinse, and repeat.
[/quote]I think I’d prefer to see you muted and not the OP.

I’d love to see a post saying you have terminal cancer.

#bestfeud2006[/quote]
Still a better love story than Twilight.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules being to strict here
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

His grammar! It’s hideous!

Mopar is a little less stricter then Rune-Server e.g. you won’t get instant ban for lolz. Judging by your profile over there, it seems like they don’t want you there too! This is a friendlier community and we don’t tolerate retarded 12 year old’s thinking their bad because their username is gaysonsmokes and I haven’t really seen a member who well… actually like you.

^ hate/rate you decide

Read full topic

item.title: Rules being to strict here

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

you guy’s are a bit to greedy with money and don’t wanna see people make more then your forums ?

Rune-Server: here and here and here seven advertisments plus donation ranks and even a new donation rank called extreme donator??
MoparScape: here and here the adblock funds go towards the hosting of the forums. sponsored servers money goes towards the forums

^had to edit that 1000 times to get it right but yeah, real statistics.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules being to strict here
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

I beleive the rules here are way to strict. For instance this is RSPS Community yet when creating a forums you need a webhost. So why let people provide to others their hosting needs is it because you guy’s are a bit to greedy with money and don’t wanna see people make more then your forums ? I know this is going to get nothing but bad replies but whatever. As I see it I have seen over 200 members leave in the past month so it don’t really bug me any just hurting yourself r-s FTW

The reason we don’t allow monetary transactions here is because of the chances of members being scammed. How is prohibiting these transactions a sign of us being “greedy”? Your logic is quite flawed. If you would like me to ban you so that you can enjoy R-S, I would be happy to do that, since MSCP isn’t FTW.

Also, where are you getting your statistics? You don’t have access to that information.

Read full topic
